Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Binding Target: site 4 of the insect voltage- gated sodium channel (Nav)
Sequence Information.Function: Insecticidal neurotoxin. Shows competition for site 3 of insect voltage-gated sodium channels (Nav). Has no effect on lepidopteran larvae when injected at 20 pmol/g, or on mice when injected intracranially at 32.8 nmol/g.

Literature.Title: Distinct primary structures of the major peptide toxins from thevenom of the spider Macrothele gigas that bind to sites 3 and 4 in thesodium channel.
Literature.Author: Corzo G., Gilles N., Satake H., Villegas E., Dai L., Nakajima T., Haupt J.
